data.actual_result: Where Discord takes you is a blank white page that reads "code" : 40002, "message" : "You need to verify your account"
data.expected_result: Take you to the discord support page in Safari
data.short_description: clicking the "Need Help?" button it takes you to a blank page that says verify this account in order to perform action
data.steps_to_repro: - Must have an unverified account/new account - Use a vpn or proxy that might considered to be used by a "bad actor" in the eyes of Discord - Trigger the "Verify you're Human" page - Click the "Need help?" Button -
